courses_skills.skills: Basic theory SDLC, STLC. Client-server architecture. HTTP. What is JSON, XML. API testing via Postman (JS, API autotests). Removing and reading logs from an external server. Sniffing http web traffic via Charles and Fiddler. Dev Tools of web browsers. Mobile testing. Feature iOS, Android, guidelines. ADB (android device management). Setting up proxy and vpn on iOS and Android. Interception (sniffing) of mobile traffic via Charles and Fiddler on iOS and Android. Command line (terminal) Linux. Basics of bash scripting, automation of routine tasks on the server. Access to remote servers. SQL basics. Load testing in Jmeter. Scrum development methodology. Python. Basic learning.
